@Lacrymabiliter @justinsail That clip of trump doesn’t exactly show him promoting that. He’s relaying what happens in other countries that don’t have problems (according to him). I take it as an A/B testing of ideas to see how they land.  

I’m not in favor of speedy trials nor death penalty.
